constituent: gulf, water, water droplets, water pistol, apple, bow
koohiiStory1: In his most daring feat, William tell used his bow to shoot an apple off the head of his son across the water of the gulf.
koohiiStory2: An army of archers must cross a gulf of water. Fortunately there are millions of apple trees growing in the cliffs above the gulf. The archers use their bows to shoot down apple after apple, which all fall into the water and slowly fill up the the gulf until the archer soliders can cross on foot.
